title: 故事模式第七章下周发布 & 预告片！
author: andylizi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 andylizi 于 2016-7-24 10:32 编辑 
预告片地址
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mwFONw71CFo
原地址需要梯子，已转B站http://www.bilibili.com/video/av5397788/[bili=5397788]0[/bili]
感谢@WuGuangYao2012  提供的中文字幕版预告
http://www.bilibili.com/video/av5403380/[bili=5403380]1[/bili]

YouTuBe上预告片的介绍及其翻译Continuing their portal journey in search of home, Jesse and crew land in a world entirely controlled by PAMA - a sinister "thinking machine" determined to command everyone and everything in pursuit of optimal usefulness and efficiency. Forced on the run to avoid capture and assimilation, you'll need to work with a new ally to defeat the corrupted computer and free the population it has enslaved.在继续寻找回家的传送门时，Jesse和他的朋友降落在一个完全由一个阴险的“思想机器”——PAMA 的控制下的世界。PAMA命令一切东西必须按照最佳的效率来高效的工作。为了避免被捕获与同化，你需要与一个新的盟友并肩作战以打败计算机并解救它奴役的人们。

（看起来有点像机翻，，但我尽力了。。）

Having barely escaped the murderous mansion-dwelling maniac in Episode 6, new and even weirder hazards await Jesse and the gang as they explore the Portal Hallway. Doorways lead to a multitude of worlds - but each proves more dangerous than the last. How will the New Order of the Stone ever find their way back home?
勉强躲过了第六章中那个凶残的居住在豪宅中的疯子，当探索传送门走廊时，新的、更怪异的危险在等待的Jesse和他的朋友们。传送门对应了众多的世界 —— 但每次尝试都比前一次更危险。新岩石之令如何才能找到他们回家的路？

Perhaps the secrets of the Old Builders lie in a world of redstone riches. Surely such a place might conceal the incredible tech necessary to see our heroes home safely. But are such clever computing powers so easily contained?
或许远古建造者的秘密就埋藏在红石世界的财宝里。当然啦这样一个地方肯定封藏着不可思议的技术能让咱们的英雄平安回家，但如此强大的电脑智能可以被轻易驾驭吗？

(No.)
【并不】

You can play this latest episode, titled “Access Denied”, next Tuesday July 26th.
你可以在下个星期二也就是7月26日玩到这最新的一章《拒之门外》。

Episode 7 can be purchased as part of the $14.99 Adventure Pass - three extra DLC episodes that follow Jesse and crew after the conclusion of the first Story Mode season. Episodes 6, 7 and 8 can also be bought individually for $4.99. You’ll need to own Episode 1 to be able to get them, though. “Access Denied” will be available to download on PC / Mac, Windows 10, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and iOS and Android-based devices. You have a week to prepare yourself to face the true power and peril of redstone!
第七章可以作为售价$14.99的 “Adventure Pass”  —— 三个额外的DLC章节将继续着Jesse和他的朋友们在第一季的大结局 —— 的一部分来购买。第六、七、八章也能分别用$4.99单独购买。但你需要拥有第一章才能购买它们。
《拒之门外》将可在 PC / MAC, Windows 10, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 与 iOS 、 Android设备上下载到。你有一周的时间来准备好面对真正的力量与危险的红石！

Cheerio!
回见！

Marsh - @marshdavies

原文 https://mojang.com/2016/07/story ... ek-heres-a-trailer/
感谢@Exodus 帮助翻译

连telltale自己都那么说了
'Minecraft: Story Mode' Episode 7 - 'Access Denied' Available Now

posted by Laura Perusco July 25th 2016

Share
Tweet
Minecraft: Story Mode adventurers will be pleased to know that the second episode in the 'Adventure Pass' add-on series, Episode 7: 'Access Denied' is available starting today on PC/Mac, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PS3, Xbox 360, and mobile! To celebrate the release, we have a few new screenshots to share.

In this episode, continuing their portal journey in search of home, Jesse and crew land in a world entirely controlled by PAMA - a sinister "thinking machine" determined to command everyone and everything in pursuit of optimal usefulness and efficiency. Forced on the run to avoid capture and assimilation, you'll need to work with a new ally to defeat the corrupted computer and free the population it has enslaved.

The all-star cast also gets another new addition for this episode, with Yvette Nicole Brown (Community) as Harper, PAMA's creator in hiding.

Check out the new screenshots below!
